casebody.data:
BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Lenard NOICE, II, as Personal Representative for Lenard E. Noice. No. 16-686. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 21, 2017.

Motion of The Association of American Railroads for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of New Mexico denied.
